skills.desc: Ability to perform basic arithmetic and calculations.
Quickly adjust to new situations and environments.
Identify issues and find effective solutions.
Work well and collaborate with others.
Guide and motivate a group to achieve goals.
Write and understand code in various languages.
Create graphics and visual content digitally.
Build and maintain websites and web apps.
Organize and manage data using databases.
Set up and maintain servers for applications.
